1608.HK.summary: VPower Group International Holdings Limited designs, integrates, and sells gas-fired and diesel-fired gen-sets and power generation systems in Hong Kong, Mainland China, other Asian countries, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, System Integration; and Investment, Building, and Operating. The System Integration segment designs, integrates, sells, and installs engine-based electricity generation units. The Investment, Building, and Operating segment designs, invests in, builds, and operates distributed power generation stations to provide distributed power solutions. In addition, the company engages in the sale and installation of power generation systems; trading of engines and components; and management and technical services. It serves customers in various sectors, including industry-grade and utility-grade DGP stations, governmental, residential and commercial buildings, data centers, hotels, construction works, mining operations, and railway and telecommunications projects. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hung Hom, Hong Kong. VPower Group International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Energy Garden Limited.

1630.HK.summary: Kin Shing Holdings Limited engages in erecting formworks for construction works in private residential and commercial buildings primarily in Hong Kong. The company primarily provides timber formworks by using timber and plywood; and metal formwork system by using aluminum and other metals. It also engages in building construction works; and securities investment business. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong. Kin Shing Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Five Continental Enterprise Limited.

1633.HK.summary: Sheung Yue Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation services to private and public sectors in Hong Kong and Macau. Its foundation works include piling construction, ELS works, pile cap construction, and site formation, as well as provides ancillary services, including loading test and construction machinery leasing services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Sheung Yue Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Creative Elite Global Limited.

1662.HK.summary: Yee Hop Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides engineering and construction services for private and public sectors in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and the Philippines. It operates through Foundation and Other Civil Works; Tunneling Works; and Breeding, Sales and Trading of Aquatic Products segments. Its foundation works include construction of mini-piles, rock-socketed steel H-piles, and driven steel H piles, as well as other civil works, such as site formation works, and road and pavement works; and tunneling works comprise pipe jacking, hand dig tunnel, and cut-and-cover tunnel works. The company is also involved in the research and development, breeding, sale, and trading of aquatic products; and provision of laboratory test services. Yee Hop Holdings Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

1707.HK.summary: Geotech Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, provides construction and engineering services, and property-related services in Hong Kong. It undertakes slope works and ground investigation field works as a contractor and subcontractor. The company undertakes landslip preventive/remedial works to slopes/retaining walls; site formation works; general civil works, including road drainage and sewer, geotechnical, and ground investigation field works; and metal scaffolding works. It also provides property management consultancy services to property owners. The company serves government departments, railway operators, property owners and developers, and professional consultants. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Geotech Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of Star Merit Global Limited.

1710.HK.summary: Trio Industrial Electronics Group Limited, an investment holding company, operates as an electronic manufacturing service provider for industrial electronic components and products in Europe, the People's Republic of China, South East Asia, North America, and internationally. It provides electro-mechanical products; smart chargers; switch-mode power supplies; and smart vending systems. The company also offers automatic testing equipment, as well as manufacturing management system, tools, and equipment; and sells and develops printed circuit boards and electronics subassemblies. Its products are applied in various industrial electronic equipment, such as renewable energy facilities, telecommunications equipment, commercial freight equipment, medical devices, and security systems. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Hung Hom, Hong Kong.

1751.HK.summary: Kingland Group Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides concrete demolition services in Hong Kong and Macau as a subcontractor. The company removes pieces or sections of concrete from concrete structures; and demolishes concrete structures or buildings through core drilling, sawing, and crushing. Its services are used in various areas, including addition and alteration works, and redevelopment projects in buildings, roads, tunnels, and underground facilities. The company was formerly known as Sing On Holdings Limited and changed its name to Kingland Group Holdings Limited in September 2018. Kingland Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong. Kingland Group Holdings Limited was formerly a subsidiary of CSI Properties Limited.

1757.HK.summary: Affluent Foundation Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides services related to foundation works in Hong Kong. It offers excavation and lateral support, and pile caps construction services; and other services, such as demolition works, underground drainage works, earthworks, and structural steel works. The company also leases machinery to other construction companies. It serves construction work companies engaged in public and/or private construction projects. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. Affluent Foundation Holdings Limited is a subsidiary Oriental Castle Group Limited.

1783.HK.summary: Golden Ponder Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides superstructure building and repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition (RMAA) works services as a contractor in Hong Kong. Its superstructure building works include building works in relation to the parts of the structure above the ground level primarily development projects for residential and commercial buildings; and RMAA works comprise repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition works for existing structures. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Golden Ponder Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Shiny Golden Limited.

1793.HK.summary: Wecon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a construction contractor in Hong Kong. The company operates in two segments, Construction Contracts; and Repair, Maintenance, Alteration and Addition (RMAA) Works Services. It offers building construction services for residential, commercial, and industrial buildings; RMAA works services, such as general upkeep, maintenance, improvement, refurbishment, alteration, and addition of existing facilities and components of buildings and their surroundings. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

1848.HK.long_name: China Aircraft Leasing Group Holdings Limited
1848.HK.summary: China Aircraft Leasing Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides aircraft leasing services to airline companies primarily in Mainland China and internationally. It is involved in the aircraft leasing, and purchase and leaseback; aircraft and portfolio trading; aircraft disassembly; and component sales activities, as well as in the maintenance, repair, and overhaul activities. The company also offers management services. As of December 31, 2019, it had a fleet of 134 owned and managed aircraft. The company was formerly known as China Aircraft Leasing Company Limited and changed its name to China Aircraft Leasing Group Holdings Limited in September 2013. China Aircraft Leasing Group Holdings Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

1850.HK.summary: WINDMILL Group Limited operates as a fire service installation contractor in Hong Kong. The company engages in the design, supply, and installation of fire safety systems for buildings under construction or re-development. It is also involved in the maintenance and repair of fire safety systems for built premises and projects, such as railway stations, utility facilities, hospitals, airport premises, and data centers. In addition, the company trades in fire service accessories, including branded fire services equipment. Windmill Group Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

1867.HK.summary: LKS Holding Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the interior fitting-out, renovation, alteration, and addition works for residential, industrial, and commercial properties in Hong Kong. It is also involved in structural alterations, structural steel works, signage works, building maintenance, refurbishment works, and ground improvement activities, as well as interior design works. The company serves contractors, landlords, and property developers. LKS Holding Group Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

1868.HK.summary: Neo-Neon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of lighting products in North America, Europe, the People's Republic of China, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company offers decorative lighting products, including neon flex, tape light, LED light string, duralight, party light, LED flexible wall washer, LED dewdrop light, and vintage style and other products. It also provides asset management, investment advisory, and securities brokerage services; and trades in lighting products. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Neo-Neon Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of THTF Energy Saving Holdings Limited.

1870.HK.summary: Acme International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides design and build solutions for faÃ§ade and building maintenance unit (BMU) system works in Hong Kong. Its activities include design, preparation of shop drawings and structural calculations, procurement of building materials and BMU systems, installation and logistics arrangement services, on-site project supervision, post-completion maintenance services, project management, and post-completion repair and maintenance. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

1882.HK.summary: Haitian International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, researches, develops, processes, manufactures, distributes, and sells plastic injection molding machines. The company offers injection molding machines. It is also involved in the trading of machinery and related accessories; sale of software of plastic injection molding machines; and provision of logistic services. It operates in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Kwai Fong, Hong Kong. Haitian International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Sky Treasure Capital Limited.

1884.HK.summary: eprint Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides printing services and solutions on advertisements, bound books, and stationeries in Hong Kong. The company operates through two segments, Paper Printing and Banner Printing. It also provides digital printing services; and information technology and management services, as well property investment services. The company operates retail shops or the self-service platform, as well as engages in the trading of optical products. It operates under the e-print and e-banner brands. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong. eprint Group Limited is a subsidiary of eprint Limited.

1920.HK.summary: Hands Form Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a subcontractor in Hong Kong. The company undertakes wet trades' works, including plastering on floors, walls, and ceilings; tile laying on internal and external walls and floors; brick laying; and laying of marble tiles to the floor. It also provides other wet trades related ancillary works, such as touch-ups, chiseling, smoothing, cleaning, applying sealant, washed granolithic screed, on-site logistics services, etc. The company primarily serves main contractors and subcontractors of various building construction projects; governments; and property developers. Hands Form Holdings Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jordan, Hong Kong.

1975.HK.summary: Sun Hing Printing Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells printing products in Hong Kong, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers packaging printing services, which include corrugated, gift, card, and product boxes; paper gift set printing services, including gift sets, such as gift boxes, cards, booklets, and hardback books; card printing services, which covers colour, insert, warranty, and plain cards; smart package printing services comprises near-field communications tags, radio-frequency identification labels, and real QR codes; and other printing services that include stickers, colour papers, yupo papers, and red packets. It serves consumer products, promotion, advertising, and education markets. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Chai Wan, Hong Kong. Sun Hing Printing Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Goody Luck Limited.

1977.HK.summary: Analogue Holdings Limited provides electrical and mechanical (E&M) engineering services in Hong Kong and internationally. It operates through four segments: Building Services; Environmental Engineering; Information, Communications, and Building Technology (ICBT); and Lift and Escalators. The Building Services segment electrical and mechanical engineering building services, including the design, installation, testing and commissioning, and maintenance of heating, ventilation and air-conditioning system; fire service system; plumbing and drainage system; and electrical and extra low voltage system. The Environmental Engineering segment is involved in the design, construction, operation, and maintenance of environmental engineering systems for the treatment of sewage, water, solid waste, sludge, and gas. The ICBT segment engages in the design, hardware and software development, installation, and maintenance of infrastructure communications, and security and access systems. This segment offers solutions for smart building technologies, comprising energy optimization, air conditioning, intelligent control and automation, security and extra low voltage, architectural and LED lighting, renewable energy, and ICT and the Internet of Things. The Lift and Escalators segment designs, supplies, installs, repairs, and maintains a range lifts escalators, and walkaways. The company serves banking, property development, education, entertainment, hospitality, information technology, data centers, transportation, and utilities sectors. Analogue Holdings Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong. Analogue Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Arling Investment Limited.

2086.HK.summary: HNA Technology Investments Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, develops, sells, and distributes smart card products, software, and hardware in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Fiji, Japan, Turkey, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, The Financial Technology and Smart Living Business; and The Financial Services and Investment Business. It also provides smart card related services; and advisory services, including financial due diligence and business operation consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Advanced Card Systems Holdings Limited and changed its name to HNA Technology Investments Holdings Limited in August 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. HNA Technology Investments Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of HNA EcoTech Pioneer Acquisition.

2110.HK.summary: Yue Kan Holdings Ltd. operates as a marine construction works subcontractor in Hong Kong. Its marine construction works include reclamation works; regulation and deposition of sand blanket works; submarine pipeline works; and sediment treatment works. The company also provides vessel chartering services; and other civil engineering works comprising foundation works, site formation works, and roads and drainage works. It serves main contractors engaged by property developers or project employers in the public and private sectors. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Jordan, Hong Kong.

2130.HK.summary: CN Logistics International Holdings Limited provides logistics solutions worldwide. It operates through three segments: Air Freight Forwarding Services, Distribution and Logistics Services, and Ocean Freight Forwarding Services. The Air Freight Forwarding Services segment offers air freight forwarding services, which include the import and export of goods, such as high-end fashion products, fast fashion products, electronics, machineries, and equipment. This segment's services include arranging for consignment upon receipt of booking instructions from customers, cargo pick up, obtaining cargo space, preparation of freight documentation, arranging for customs clearance, and cargo handling at origin and destination, as well as other related logistics services comprising supporting transportation for freight forwarding purposes. The Distribution and Logistics Services segment provides services to brand owners, retailers, and other customers primarily consisting of high-end fashion brands. This segment offers a range of logistics services, such as organizing and optimizing warehousing usage, transportation routes and trucking service providers, storage, palletizing, trucking and distribution, managing vendor inventory, picking and packing finished goods, reverse logistics services and recycling, providing control and various ancillary value-added services, such as supply chain management and storage services; and distribution and logistics services for wine, as well as branded packaging, polymorph repacking, same day local door-to-door, and temperature-controlled delivery services. The Ocean Freight Forwarding Services segment offers ocean freight forwarding services primarily to its air freight forwarding services and other customers. The company's customer base principally includes direct customers and freight forwarder customers. CN Logistics International Holdings Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.

2132.HK.summary: Landrich Holding Limited undertakes construction works in Hong Kong. It is involved in the construction of trunk roads, carriageways, bridges, and tunnels, as well as modification of existing roads that include landscaping works, laying of pipes, and manhole construction. The company also engages in the clearance of construction site, demolition of existing structures, reduction and stabilization of existing slopes, and associated work; and establishment of fill tank for the storage of public fill materials arising from construction activities. In addition, it is involved in the construction of buildings, primarily structural steel works, and transportation and heavy lifting works, as well as construction of reinforced concrete structures. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.

2225.HK.summary: Jinhai International Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily provides manpower outsourcing and ancillary services to building and construction contractors in Singapore. The company offers labor dispatching and supporting services. It also provides dormitory services; information technology services, such as support and maintenance; and construction ancillary services comprising warehousing, cleaning, and building maintenance works. The company was formerly known as Kakiko Group Limited and changed its name to Jinhai International Group Holdings Limited in October 2019. Jinhai International Group Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

2262.HK.summary: Steve Leung Design Group Limited provides interior design services in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. It operates through Interior Design Services, Interior Decorating and Furnishing Services, and Product Design Services segments. The company offers interior design, and decorating and furnishing services for residential projects, including show flats, sales offices, standard provisions, and club houses; private residence projects consisting of apartments, penthouses, and villas; and hospitality projects comprising restaurants, hotels, serviced apartments, and shopping malls, as well as commercial projects, such as office premises. It also trades in interior decorative products, as well as license arrangement of interior design services and product design services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Steve Leung Design Group Limited is a subsidiary of Eagle Vision Development Limited.

2322.HK.summary: Hong Kong ChaoShang Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in vessel chartering, trading, money lending, factoring, and finance leasing businesses in the People's Republic of China and Southeast Asia. It owns a multi-purpose deck cargo ship for carriage of construction material and waste. The company also trades in molds, electronics products, seafood, frozen meats and food, and methanol; and provides factoring, entrusted loan financing, and finance leasing and sale-leaseback services. In addition, it provides consultancy; securities brokerage, underwriting, placing, margin financing; and asset management services. The company was formerly known as Noble Century Investment Holdings Limited and changed its name to Hong Kong ChaoShang Group Limited in August 2019. Hong Kong ChaoShang Group Limited was incorporated in 2002 is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

2327.HK.long_name: Meilleure Health International Industry Group Limited
2327.HK.summary: Meilleure Health International Industry Group Limited, an investment holding company, trades in health care products, and construction and chemical materials in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It operates through six segments: Trading Business, Agency Service, Property Development, Property Investment and Leasing, Health Care Related Business, and Corporate. The company is also involved in the sale of medicines; leasing of building materials; property investment and leasing; provision of real estate agency services; and development of residential properties. In addition, it offers anti-aging health management services. The company was formerly known as U-Home Group Holdings Limited and changed its name to Meilleure Health International Industry Group Limited in March 2017. Meilleure Health International Industry Group Limited is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

2343.HK.summary: Pacific Basin Shipping Limited, an investment holding company, provides dry bulk shipping services worldwide. As of February 29, 2020, the company had a fleet of 235 ships, including 139 Handysize vessels and 96 Supramax vessels. It also offers shipping consulting, ocean shipping, crewing, secretarial, and agency and ship management services, as well as issues convertible bonds. Pacific Basin Shipping Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Wong Chuk Hang, Hong Kong.

2885.HK.summary: Peiport Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, provides thermal and self-stabilized imaging products and services in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers thermal imaging products under the PTi and other brand names primarily for use in the general consumption, commercial, and industrial fields, as well as thermal imaging inspection services. It also provides self-stabilized imaging products and services mounted on aircrafts, helicopters, vessels, and ships under the SkyEye, SeaVision, and PGs brand names, as well as rents self-stabilized imaging products for aircrafts. In addition, the company distributes general aviation products, including light and ultra-light aircraft engines and related components; and provides maintenance training courses, as well as maintenance and support services to light and ultra-light aircraft manufacturers, flight schools, flying entertainment clubs, light aircraft research institutions, and private flight owners. Peiport Holdings Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tai Po, Hong Kong. Peiport Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of Peiport Alpha Ltd.

2V3.F.summary: VPower Group International Holdings Limited designs, integrates, and sells gas-fired and diesel-fired gen-sets and power generation systems in Hong Kong, Mainland China, other Asian countries, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, System Integration; and Investment, Building, and Operating. The System Integration segment designs, integrates, sells, and installs engine-based electricity generation units. The Investment, Building, and Operating segment designs, invests in, builds, and operates distributed power generation stations to provide distributed power solutions. In addition, the company engages in the sale and installation of power generation systems; trading of engines and components; and management and technical services. It serves customers in various sectors, including industry-grade and utility-grade DGP stations, governmental, residential and commercial buildings, data centers, hotels, construction works, mining operations, and railway and telecommunications projects. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hung Hom, Hong Kong. VPower Group International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Energy Garden Limited.

3393.HK.summary: Wasion Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, researches, develops, produces, and sells energy metering and energy efficiency management for energy supply industries in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through Power Advanced Metering Infrastructure, Communication and Fluid Advanced Metering Infrastructure, and Advanced Distribution Operations segments. It offers smart meters, smart water meters, smart gas meters, and ultrasonic calorimeters; various meters and power quality monitoring devices; energy data collection terminals, load management terminals, and user management devices; and measurement automation systems and various application systems, services, and energy data mining, as well as system solution and communication terminals solution services. The company also offers high voltage switchgears, smart switchgears, circuit breakers, power distribution automation terminals, electrical and electronic devices for power quality control, and smart distribution systems, as well as engineering, energy-saving services, etc. In addition, it provides smart power distribution devices and energy efficiency solution services; and power meters and heat meters, as well as trades in electronic components. Additionally, the company offers energy meters; plastic, iron, and reinforced plastic meter boxes; switching smart sockets; calibration devices; and heat distribution system solutions. The company was formerly known as Wasion Group Holdings Limited and changed its name to Wasion Holdings Limited in June 2018. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong. Wasion Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Star Treasure Investments Holdings Limited.

3399.HK.summary: Guangdong Yueyun Transportation Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides integrated transportation and logistics services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers road passenger transportation and auxiliary services, such as urban passenger transportation, public transportation, cross-border transportation, and passenger and freight station services. It also operates gas stations, charging stations, and retail convenience stores. In addition, the company engages in expressway toll collection business; advertising media business; and suppling construction materials. Further, it is involved in the advertising, real estate leasing, fuel retail, general freight, property management, vehicle inspection and testing, and motor driver training businesses; and sale of vehicle spare parts. Additionally, the company offers logistics, tourism, commercial, hotel, and business services, as well as develops and sells smart cards and electronic payment systems. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Nan Yue Logistics Company Limited and changed its name to Guangdong Yueyun Transportation Company Limited in August 2013. Guangdong Yueyun Transportation Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong. Guangdong Yueyun Transportation Company Limited is a subsidiary of Guangdong Provincial Communication Group Company Limited.

3628.HK.summary: RENHENG Enterprise Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells tobacco machinery products in the People's Republic of China. It offers special-purpose tobacco machinery products, such as casing and flavoring systems, pneumatic feeding systems, and pre-pressing packing machines. The company also provides non-catalogued ancillary tobacco machinery, including dedusting systems and swelling agent delivery systems; and maintenance, overhaul, and modification services. RENHENG Enterprise Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

3683.HK.long_name: Great Harvest Maeta Group Holdings Limited
3683.HK.summary: Great Harvest Maeta Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, charters out own dry bulk vessels worldwide. It operates through Chartering of Vessels; and Property Investment and Development segments. The company owns four vessels with total carrying capacity of 319,923 deadweight tonnage. It also provides agency services. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

3728.HK.summary: Ching Lee Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of construction, consultancy, and project management services in Hong Kong. The company undertakes substructure building works; superstructure building works; and repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition works. It is also involved in property holding activities. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jordan, Hong Kong. Ching Lee Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of JT Glory Limited.

3816.HK.summary: KFM Kingdom Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells precision metal stamping and metal lathing products in the People's Republic of China, North America, Europe, Japan, Singapore, and internationally. It also manufactures and sells fine metal products; sells and rents kiosks; manufactures and trades in senor products; trades in medical products; and provides management services. In addition, the company offers integrated services, including design engineering solutions; prototyping, computer numerical control (CNC) laser cutting, CNC tooling design and tooling mold design, and lathing or machining parts; hard tooling and soft tooling services; secondary processing services comprising laser welding or robotic argon welding, riveting, tapping, drilling, polishing, sand blasting, etc.; and post-treatment processing services, such as silk screening printing, heat treatment, plating, coating, etc., as well as product assembly and quality testing services. Additionally, it provides packaging solutions. It serves medical and test equipment, finance equipment, consumer electronics, network/data storage, and office automation industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. KFM Kingdom Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Massive Force Limited.

3877.HK.summary: CSSC (Hong Kong) Shipping Company Limited operates as a shipyard-affiliated leasing company in People Republic of China, Asia, the United States, and Europe. It operates through Leasing Services, Shipbroking Services, and Loan Borrowings segments. The company provides leasing services, such as finance and operating lease. It also offers shipbroking services; and loan services comprising pre-delivery loan, secured loan, and factoring services. As of December 31, 2019, the company had 117 vessels, including 81 vessels were operating and 36 vessels were under construction. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

3878.HK.summary: Vicon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation works and related services in Hong Kong and Macau. The company undertakes piling construction, ELS, and pile cap construction works, as well as general building works. It serves property developers, and project owners and their contractors, as well as public sectors. Vicon Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong.

3898.HK.long_name: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd.
3898.HK.summary: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells train-borne electrical systems and electrical components primarily in Mainland China and internationally. The company researches, develops, manufactures, and sells locomotive train power converters, control systems, urban railway train electrical systems, and other train-borne electrical systems; and electric components for the railway industry, urban railway industry, and non-railway purposes. Its products for rolling stock and railways include EMU, locomotive, and mass transit systems; and components products consist of semiconductors, resistors, reactors, radiators, sensors, power capacitors, heatsinks, and oil dampers. The company's energy and industrial products comprise marine engineering, electric vehicle, and inverter and converter systems, as well as provides railway maintenance and construction machines. The company was formerly known as Zhuzhou CSR Times Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd. in March 2016. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of CRRC Zhuzhou Institute Co., Ltd.

39J.F.summary: Sinotrans Shipping Limited, a shipping company, owns, manages, and operates dry bulk and container fleet worldwide. It operates through Dry Bulk Shipping, Container Shipping, and Others segments. The company is involved in dry bulk vessel time chartering and cargo voyage chartering businesses; container vessel time chartering, container line service, freight forwarding, and other related businesses; and shipping agency, ship management, and liquefied natural gas shipping business. Its dry bulk fleet is used for the transportation of bulk cargoes, such as iron ore, coal, grains, steel, and other break-bulk cargoes. The company also provides agency services for shipping forwarding and air cargo. As of December 31, 2017, it controlled a fleet of 113 vessels, including 36 dry bulk vessels with an aggregate capacity of approximately 3.37 million deadweight tons and 14 container vessels with an aggregate capacity of 16,733 twenty-foot equivalent unit. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Sinotrans Shipping Limited operates as a subsidiary of Sinomarine Limited

3LL.F.summary: CSSC (Hong Kong) Shipping Company Limited operates as a shipyard-affiliated leasing company in People Republic of China, Asia, the United States, and Europe. It operates through Leasing Services, Shipbroking Services, and Loan Borrowings segments. The company provides leasing services, such as finance and operating lease. It also offers shipbroking services; and loan services comprising pre-delivery loan, secured loan, and factoring services. As of December 31, 2019, the company had 117 vessels, including 81 vessels were operating and 36 vessels were under construction. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

6063.HK.summary: Lotus Horizon Holdings Limited provides design, supply, and installation services for facade works and building metal finishing works in Hong Kong. It also offers window fabrication and installation services. The company offers its services for commercial properties, residential properties, and public facilities. It serves contractors and property developers. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Sha Tin, Hong Kong. Lotus Horizon Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Platinum Lotus Holdings Limited.

6110.HK.summary: Topsports International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates sportswear retail and service platforms in China. As of February 29, 2020, it operated a retail network, which included 8,395 directly-operated stores. The company also offers information technology services; and trades in sportswear products. Topsports International Holdings Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong. Topsports International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Belle Sports Limited.

6123.HK.summary: YTO Express (International) Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides freight forwarding services in the People's Republic of China, Europe, North America, and other Asian regions. It operates through five segments: Air Freight, Ocean Freight, Logistics, International Express and Parcel, and Others. The company offers freight forwarding services through air, sea, land, and trucking services. It also provides other services, including warehousing, distribution, customs clearance, general sales agency, hand-carry, and contract and ancillary logistics services, as well as package delivery solutions. In addition, the company is involved in the issuing of bills of lading and provision of freight forwarding brokerage services activities. It serves customers in various sectors, including fashion and lifestyle, e-commerce, aviation, food and beverage, special projects, and high-tech. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. YTO Express (International) Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of YTO Express Group Co., Ltd.

6182.HK.summary: Twintek Investment Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale of building materials; and provision of construction and engineering services in Hong Kong. The company operates through Sales of Building Materials and Construction Contracts segments. Its products include interior wall-fill materials comprising gypsum block products; timber flooring; roof tiles; and woodwork products. It primarily serves contractors. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Quarry Bay, Hong Kong. Twintek Investment Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Helios Enterprise Holding Limited.

6805.HK.summary: Kimou Environmental Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the development and management of electroplating industrial parks in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through three segments, Rental and Facilities, Wastewater Treatment and Utilities, and Sales of Goods and Ancillary Business. The company's Rental and Facilities Usage segment conducts industrial park property development and management business. Its Wastewater Treatment and Utilities Business segment operates electroplating wastewater treatment plants and provides utilities services. The Sales of Goods and Ancillary Business segment sells raw materials and provides environmental services. The company operates two electroplating industrial parks, including the Guangdong Huizhou Park and the Tianjin Bingang Park. Kimou Environmental Holding Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

6812.HK.summary: Winson Holdings Hong Kong Limited, an investment holding company, provides environmental hygiene and related, and airline catering support services in Hong Kong. It offers environmental hygiene services, including public area and office cleaning, and waste disposal, as well as specialized services, such as external curtain wall and window cleaning, marble floor maintenance and restoration, intensive cleaning, pest control services, etc. to residential, commercial and shopping complexes, public utilities, transportation systems, and government bodies. The company also provides pest control services comprising indoor pest management and rodent prevention, as well as control services that involve spraying of pesticides and fogging treatment, etc. to a range of customers, including government departments, educational institutes, public utilities, and transportation systems, as well as residential, commercial, and shopping complexes. In addition, it offers airline catering support services, such as plating of meals, tray-setting, dry store packing, internal logistic for equipment flow, etc. at flight kitchens of airline catering operators. Further, the company provides property holding services. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. Winson Holdings Hong Kong Limited is a subsidiary of Sze's Holdings Limited.

6829.HK.summary: Dragon Rise Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, undertakes foundation works as a subcontractor in Hong Kong. The company's activities include excavation and lateral support works, and pile cap construction works; and disposal of excavated materials from piling. It also provides ancillary services, including dismantling of shoring, site formation, steel fixing, and site clearance; and trades in construction materials. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shatin, Hong Kong. Dragon Rise Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Fame Circle Limited.

6888.HK.summary: Freetech Road Recycling Technology (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells road maintenance equipment, and provides road maintenance services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Maintenance Services and Sale of Equipment segments. It offers asphalt pavement maintenance (APM) equipment; and APM services to repair damaged asphalt pavement surfaces under the Road Doctor brand. Freetech Road Recycling Technology (Holdings) Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

7S8.F.summary: SITC International Holdings Company Limited, a shipping logistics company, provides integrated transportation and logistics solutions in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It operates in two segments, Container Shipping and Logistics; and Dry Bulk and Others. The Container Shipping and Logistics segment offers container transportation, freight forwarding, shipping agency, depot and warehousing, etc. The Dry Bulk and Others segment provides dry bulk vessel and land leasing, as well as air-freight forwarding services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated a fleet of 82 vessels with a total capacity of 117,578 TEU, including 57 self-owned vessels with a capacity of 76,705 TEU and 25 chartered vessels with a capacity of 40,873 TEU. It also offers container and vessel holding, and chartering; and technology support services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. SITC International Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of Resourceful Link Management Limited.

8020.HK.summary: Unitas Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides corporate finance advisory services primarily to listed and non-listed companies in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. It operates through Corporate Finance Advisory Service; Dry Bulk Shipping and Logistic Services; and IP Automation and Entertainment Business segments. The company advises on the listing rules, growth enterprise market (GEM) listing rules, and takeovers codes; mergers and acquisitions activities; other corporate activities, such as fund raising exercises; and corporate resumptions, as well as acts as an independent financial adviser to transactions of listed issuers that are under the listing rules, GEM listing rules, and takeovers codes. It also provides automation gift machines, thematic game machines, and carnival game booths, as well as retails outlet. The company was formerly known as Chanceton Financial Group Limited and changed its name to Unitas Holdings Limited in October 2016. Unitas Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

8021.HK.summary: WLS Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides scaffolding and fitting out, and other auxiliary services for the construction and building works businesses in Hong Kong. It operates in four segments: Scaffolding, Fitting Out and Other Auxiliary Services for Construction and Buildings Work; Money Lending Business; Securities Investment Business; and Assets Management Business. The company offers various scaffolding services, including metal-bamboo matrix system scaffold, bamboo scaffold, steel/ Pik Lik scaffold, and lift-shaft scaffold. It also provides permanent gondola services, such as building maintenance unit and permanent access platform; temporary gondola services; and gondolas rental services. In addition, the company offers false ceiling and fitting out services; glass fiber reinforced concrete, glass reinforced plastic, signages, artworks, and stamping concrete solutions; and transportation, management, and consultancy services. Further, it engages in the property holding, and money lending businesses; design, sale, trade, repair, and maintenance of gondolas and parapet railings; and installation and maintenance of access equipment. Additionally, the company provides securities investment, assets management, and management contracting services. WLS Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Aberdeen, Hong Kong.

8023.HK.summary: Kwong Man Kee Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides engineering services to the car park flooring industry in Hong Kong. The company offers flooring services, including application of proprietary floor coating products for providing a colorful, slip-resistance, and hard wearing surface that is resistant against water and petrochemicals; and ancillary services comprising specialized texture painting and waterproofing works. It also offers screeding and anti-skid surfacing services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Kwong Man Kee Group Limited is a subsidiary of Sage City Investments Limited.

8039.HK.summary: KNK Holdings Limited provides architectural and structural engineering consultancy services in Hong Kong. Its services include licensing consultancy; alteration and addition works and minor works consultancy; inspection and certification; and other architecture related consultancy. KNK Holdings Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

8051.HK.summary: CircuTech International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of video surveillance systems in North America, Europe, Asia, Africa, and internationally. It is also involved in the distribution of third party IT products; and provision of repair, maintenance, and other support services for electronic products. The company was formerly known as TeleEye Holdings Limited and changed its name to CircuTech International Holdings Limited in August 2016. CircuTech International Holdings Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. CircuTech International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Foxconn (Far East) Limited.

8059.HK.summary: Glory Flame Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of construction works and building materials supply activities in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. It offers concrete demolition and construction engineering services; undertakes construction works; and provides concrete coring, wall sawing and diamond wire cutting, and bridge and road saw cutting, as well as demolition through hydraulic crusher and burster, grouting and bar fixing, and various demolition robots. The company also trades in clean coal and others, and ecological LED cultivation cabinet systems. In addition, it is involved in the research and sale of LED cultivation cabinets; and manufacture and sale of prefabricated precast costruction components. Glory Flame Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.

8065.HK.summary: KML Technology Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides electrical and mechanical (E&M) engineering solutions and services in Hong Kong, Taiwan, Singapore, Canada, and internationally. The company provides electrical and mechanical engineering solutions and services for transportation mission critical system solutions, such as automatic fare collection system, electronic payment and ticketing system, road and tunnel toll collection system, traffic control and surveillance system, and railway signaling communication and control system. It also offers security and access control system services; railway station electrical and mechanical engineering services, and architectural works, including services in relation to air-conditioning and mechanical ventilation system, fire service system, plumbing and drainage system, and electrical system; and trackside and depot electrical and mechanical engineering works. In addition, the company provides engineering design and fabrication services for the fabrication of made-to-order products, such as control room consoles, public access kiosks and terminals, relay racks, test rigs, control room technical furniture, and industrial enclosures and instrument cabinets. Further, it offers rolling stock refurbishment and modification services; and railway and road transport infrastructure project services, as well as sells railway parts and components. The company serves transportation companies, engineering companies, and governmental departments. KML Technology Group Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Shatin, Hong Kong.

8115.HK.long_name: Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co., Ltd.
8115.HK.summary: Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells firefighting equipment and pressure vessel products in the People's Republic of China, the United States, the European Union, and internationally. The company operates through seven segments: Fire-Fighting Equipment, Inspection Services, Grooved Couplings, Trading, Aquarium Products, Marine Fire-Fighting, and Property Investment. It also provides fire technology inspection services; installs and inspects marine fire-fighting equipment; manufactures and trades in iron casted grooved couplings; trades in sanitary-ware and other products; and invests in and rents office buildings and industrial properties, as well as sells aquarium products. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Factory and changed its name to Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co., Ltd. in December 2000. The company is based in North Point, Hong Kong. Shanghai Qingpu Fire-Fighting Equipment Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Liancheng Fire-Fighting Group Company Limited.

8128.HK.long_name: China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited
8128.HK.summary: China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, exploration, and development of geothermal energy as alternative energy for building heating in Mainland China. The company operates through four segments: Shallow Geothermal Energy, Air Conditioning/Shallow Geothermal Heat Pump, Properties Investment and Development, and Securities Investment and Trading. The Shallow Geothermal Energy segment engages in the provision, installation, and maintenance of shallow geothermal energy utilization systems. The Air Conditioning/Shallow Geothermal Heat Pump segment trades in air conditioning/shallow geothermal heat pump products. The Properties Investment and Development segment invests in properties for rental income. The Securities Investment and Trading segment engages in the trading of securities and other types of investments. China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited also provides property management and technical support services; and installs energy systems. The company was formerly known as China Ground Source Energy Industry Group Limited and changed its name to China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited in May 2018. China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

8133.HK.summary: Jete Power Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells cast metal products in Germany, Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, the United States, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Metal Casting and Entertainment. The company provides pump, filter, valve, and food machinery components made from stainless steel, carbon steel, bronze, and/or grey iron. It serves suppliers of flow control devices, electromechanical equipment, and industrial machinery and equipment. The company also organizes concerts and events. Jete Power Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

8137.HK.summary: Honbridge Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of lithium battery in the People's Republic of China, Belgium, and Sweden. It operates through Mineral Resources Exploration and Trading; Lithium Battery Production; and Battery Swapping Service segments. The company also researches and explores mineral resources; trades in copper and steel; and provides power exchange services. In addition, the company researches and explores for iron ores in Brazil. The company is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Honbridge Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Hong Bridge Capital Limited.

8149.HK.summary: Altus Holdings Limited provides corporate finance and property investment services in Hong Kong and Japan. The company operates through Corporate Finance Services and Property Investment. It offers corporate finance services, including sponsorship, financial advisory, and compliance advisory services. The company also leases investment properties for residential and commercial use; and provides administrative services. Altus Holdings Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Altus Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Kinley-Hecico Holdings Limited.

8166.HK.summary: China Eco-Farming Limited, an investment holding company, provides one-stop value chain services in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and Taiwan. The company is involved in the provision of value chain services, including trading, packaging, and logistics solutions; and trade of consumables and agricultural products, as well as grocery food products. It also engages in the rental of investment properties; and provision of financial and investment advisory, corporate finance, securities holding, and money lending services, as well as trades in recycle bags. The company was formerly known as Linefan Technology Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Eco-Farming Limited in October 2009. China Eco-Farming Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

8203.HK.summary: Kaisun Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the mining, exploitation, processing, production, and sale of coal. It operates through seven segments: Production and Exploitation of Coal in Xinjiang, Provision of Supply Chain Management Services for Mineral Business, Trading Securities, Mining and Metallurgical Machineries Production in Shandong, Organising eSports Event, Corporate Services Business, and Media Services. The company mines for thermal coal, and anthracite and bituminous coal. It also provides supply chain management services for the mineral business; produces mining and metallurgical machineries; trades in securities; and manufactures coal mining related equipment. In addition, the company engages in the provision of corporate, consulting, project investment, advertising and public relationship event, media, and trust and trustee services; and e-commerce, e-sport, and financial lease and general trading businesses. It has operations in Hong Kong, rest of the People's Republic of China, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Macau, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Kaisun Energy Group Limited and changed its name to Kaisun Holdings Limited in July 2018. Kaisun Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Wong Chuk Hang, Hong Kong.

8206.HK.long_name: Shentong Robot Education Group Company Limited
8206.HK.summary: Shentong Robot Education Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides robotics education services in the People's Republic of China. It provides promotion and management services for an electronic smart card through Designated Shentong Card. The company also organizes and hosts China Robot Competition; and offers robotics training courses. In addition, it provides robot related consultancy, conference, and advertising services. The company was formerly known as China Communication Telecom Services Company Limited and changed its name to Shentong Robot Education Group Company Limited in September 2016. Shentong Robot Education Group Company Limited is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

8208.HK.summary: WMCH Global Investment Limited, an investment holding company, provides civil and structural engineering consultancy services to infrastructural, residential, industrial, commercial, and institutional projects in Singapore, Vietnam, and internationally. The company also offers master planning, structural due diligence, and visual inspection services to existing buildings. In addition, it provides geotechnical engineering consultancy services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in North Point, Hong Kong. WMCH Global Investment Limited is a subsidiary of WMCH Global Holdings Limited.

8216.HK.summary: Maxicity Holdings Limited operates as a slope work contractor in Hong Kong. It undertakes drilling and installation of soil nails; construction of retaining walls; installation of debris flow protection rigid barriers; construction of flexible barrier systems; installation of raking drains; installation of wire meshes and mats for erosion control; construction of concrete maintenance stairways/access systems; and landscape softworks and establishment works. The company also engages in reinforcement bar fixing, concreting formwork and concreting, and general civil works subcontracting activities. It serves public and private sector projects construction contractors. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Mongkok, Hong Kong.

8217.HK.summary: Luen Wong Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a subcontractor in civil engineering works in Hong Kong. It undertakes civil engineering works, including roads and drainage works, such as construction and improvement of local road, carriageway with junction improvement, and the associated footpaths, planting areas, drains, sewers, water mains, and utilities diversion; structural works comprises of construction of reinforced concrete structures for bridges and retaining walls; and site formation works consisting of excavation and/or filling works for forming a new site and achieving designed formation level for later development. The company also provides decoration and renovation works. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

8275.HK.summary: Beaver Group (Holding) Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation work and ancillary services in Hong Kong and Macau. The company undertakes bored piling and other foundation works. It also offers management services for construction works; and machinery rental and leasing services. Beaver Group (Holding) Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.

8309.HK.summary: Man Shing Global Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides environmental cleaning services in Hong Kong. The company offers street cleaning solutions, which include street and public area, and refuse collection point cleaning, as well as pest control; building cleaning services, including general building cleaning, refuse collection and waste disposal, toilet cleaning, and janitorial services; and bus and ferry cleaning services, such as general depot and pier cleaning, vehicle and vessel cleaning, refuse collection and waste disposal, and toilet cleaning. It also provides other cleaning services comprising sewage management and fumigation services, as well as external wall and window, and confined space cleaning services. The company serves government, private, and public transport sector customers. Man Shing Global Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.

8310.HK.long_name: Dafeng Port Heshun Technology Company Limited
8310.HK.summary: Dafeng Port Heshun Technology Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in trading business in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. The company operates through Integrated Logistics Handling Services; Trading Business; and Petrochemical Products Storage Business segments. It trades in textile, wood logs, scrap metal, electronic products, petrochemical products etc.; and manufactures and trades in tin wires. The company also engages in the petrochemical products storage business. In addition, it provides terminal handling and berthing and supply chain management services. The company was formerly known as Gamma Logistics Corporation and changed its name to Dafeng Port Heshun Technology Company Limited in May 2015. Dafeng Port Heshun Technology Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Dafeng Port Heshun Technology Company Limited is a subsidiary of Dafeng Port Overseas Investment Holdings Limited.

8317.HK.summary: Finet Group Limited, an investment holding company, develops, produces, and provides financial information services, advertising and investor relationship services, and technology solutions to corporate and retail investors in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in four segments: Financial Information, Advertising and Investor Relationship Service Business; Securities and Futures Business; Money Lending Business; and Property Investment Business. It also offers branding promotion, and communication services; digital marketing and advertising, public relationship, and events management; and online securities and futures trading services. In addition, the company produces and distributes programs through the FinTV brand; and invests in properties. Further, it provides securities brokerage, placing and underwriting, and asset management services; and provides money lending, video making, data hosting, financial public relationship and information management, online and offline advertising, financial services, and value-added telecommunication services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Finet Group Limited is a subsidiary of Maxx Capital International Limited.

8341.HK.summary: Aeso Holding Limited, an investment holding company, provides fitting-out and renovation contracting services in Hong Kong. It undertakes fitting-out works for the construction of newly built commercial premises and residential developments; and renovation works, including alteration and addition works for existing commercial premises. The company also offers interior design services. It serves property developers, contractors, landlords, government authority, and international retail brands and local retailers. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

8391.HK.long_name: Elegance Commercial and Financial Printing Group Limited
8391.HK.summary: Elegance Commercial and Financial Printing Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides printing, typesetting, and translation services in Hong Kong. It offers commercial printing, financial printing, secured data printing, lettershopping and direct mailing, digital printing, and book printing services, as well as document solutions. The company prints direct mailing materials, promotional and marketing materials, textbooks and related publication materials, financial reporting documents, compliance documents, initial public offerings prospectuses, and application forms. It also provides ad hoc design and/or translation, marketing and media, courier, and machineries subletting services; and sells paper and accessories. Elegance Commercial and Financial Printing Group Limited offers its services to banks, insurance companies, corporate customers, and their advertising agents and fund houses; listed companies and listing applicants; and book publishers. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. As of November 19, 2019, Elegance Commercial and Financial Printing Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Global Fortune Global Limited.

8419.HK.summary: AV Promotions Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides visual, lighting, and audio solution services in the Hong Kong, Macau, and People's Republic of China. It offers services to its customers in various events, including exhibitions, ceremonies, conferences, concerts, TV shows, product launches, and other types of events. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Aberdeen, Hong Kong. AV Promotions Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Mega King Elite Investment Limited.

8425.HK.summary: Hing Ming Holdings Limited provides rental services for temporary suspended working platforms and other equipment. It rents tower cranes and generators; and trades in equipment and spare parts, including permanent suspended working platforms, motors, and wire ropes. The company also offers project planning; design and customization; delivery of equipment to construction site; installation and inspection; on-site customer support; and disassembly and delivery of equipment, as well as construction consulting services. It provides services to construction companies, owners of commercial properties, and trading companies in Hong Kong, Thailand, Macau, and internationally. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kowloon City, Hong Kong. Hing Ming Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Hing Gut Limited.

8431.HK.summary: Hao Bai International (Cayman) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, procurement, and installation of water circulation systems in Hong Kong and Macau. It operates through Management Contracting Services, Consultancy Services, and Maintenance Services segments. The company's water circulation systems include swimming pools, water fountains, water curtains, etc. It also offers consulting, maintenance, and repair services for water circulation systems. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Hao Bai International (Cayman) Limited is a subsidiary of Harmony Asia international Limited.

8450.HK.summary: EDICO Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides integrated financial printing services in Hong Kong. Its integrated services include typesetting and proofreading, translation, design, printing and binding, distribution, and media placement. The company handles a range of documents, including listing-related documents, periodical reporting documents, compliance documents, and other miscellaneous and marketing collaterals. It serves listing applicants and listed companies. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. EDICO Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Achiever Choice Limited.

8460.HK.summary: Basetrophy Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a substructure subcontractor in Hong Kong. It engages in the provision of foundation and site formation works, including ELS works, sheet piling, pipe piling, pre-boring, pre-bored H-piling, mini-piling, and bored piling; and other geotechnical engineering works, such as slope works and other minor geotechnical works. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in San Po Kong, Hong Kong. Basetrophy Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Brightly Ahead Limited.

8472.HK.summary: Lapco Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides environmental hygiene services in Hong Kong. The company offers cleaning, pest management, waste management and recycling, and landscaping services to a range of venues, including streets, cultural, leisure, and recreational and residential premises, commercial buildings, markets, restaurants, academic institutions, etc. It serves government departments, property management companies, and other corporations in the private sector. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Lapco Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Gold Cavaliers International Limited.

8501.HK.summary: Sanbase Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, provides interior fit-out solutions in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. It undertakes bare shell fit-out, restacking, reinstatement, design, churn works, and maintenance and other services. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Sanbase Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Madison Square International Investment Limited.

8516.HK.summary: Grand Talents Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of civil engineering construction works of road and highway related infrastructures in Hong Kong. It also undertakes repair and maintenance projects for roads and highways, and other infrastructures, such as construction of pavilion and seawall; and construction projects for barrier-free access facilities and drainage systems. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

8523.HK.summary: Sheung Moon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the business of civil engineering construction works in Hong Kong. The company undertakes site formation works, road and drainage works, and structural works for public and private sectors. It also holds properties. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong. Sheung Moon Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Chrysler Investments Limited.

8526.HK.summary: Wing Fung Group Asia Limited, an investment holding company, provides supply, installation, and fitting-out services of mechanical ventilation and air-conditioning systems for buildings in Hong Kong and Macau. It serves contractors and subcontractors of various types of building projects, including infrastructural, commercial, and residential building projects. The company was formerly known as Wing Fung Capital Holdings Limited and changed its name to Wing Fung Group Asia Limited in December 2016. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Wing Fung Group Asia Limited is a subsidiary of Wing Fung Capital Limited.

8532.HK.summary: Polyfair Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Hong Kong. It designs and provides faÃ§ade systems and curtain wall work solutions for residential and commercial buildings. The company offers various design and build services for various projects, such as developing designs, conducting structural calculations, preparing shop drawings, sourcing and procuring building materials, arranging for building material logistics and installation works, project management, and post-project completion services. It serves property developers and contractors from the private sector. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong. Polyfair Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of C.N.Y. Holdings Limited.

8601.HK.summary: Boltek Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides engineering consultancy services with a focus on the field of infrastructure developments in Hong Kong. The company offers engineering consultancy services comprising civil engineering services, such as road and structural engineering; geotechnical engineering; and traffic engineering. Its engineering consultant services for infrastructure works include roads, bridges, noise barriers, barrier-free access facilities, slope improvement, foundation works, drainage, and river walls. Boltek Holdings Limited also provides ancillary services, which comprise deployment of engineering and related staff to government authority by recruiting, employing, and remunerating individuals on contract basis; and advisory services on the implementation of contract administration procedures in infrastructure development project. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. Boltek Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Waywin Investment Holding Limited.

8616.HK.summary: Sunray Engineering Group Limited offers building protection solutions in Hong Kong and Macau. The company undertakes waterproofing, flooring, and joint sealant works for residential and commercial buildings, and community facilities in public and private sectors. It also supplies building protection products, including waterproofing products, tiling products, and flooring and other products. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong. Sunray Engineering Group Limited is a subsidiary of Ultra Success Industries Limited.

8617.HK.summary: Best Linking Group Holdings Limited manufactures and sells slewing rings in the People's Republic of China, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Canada, Taiwan, Northern Ireland, the United States, Japan, Thailand, and internationally. The company provides slewing rings for use as transmission part in construction machineries and equipment, wind turbines, military equipment, robotics, cranes, excavators, solar powers, generators, attachments, etc. It offers its products under the original brand manufacturing, original design manufacturing, and original equipment manufacturing basis. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.

911868.TW.summary: Neo-Neon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of lighting products in North America, Europe, the People's Republic of China, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company offers decorative lighting products, including neon flex, tape light, LED light string, duralight, party light, LED flexible wall washer, LED dewdrop light, and vintage style and other products. It also provides asset management, investment advisory, and securities brokerage services; and trades in lighting products. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Neo-Neon Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of THTF Energy Saving Holdings Limited.

ADGS.summary: ADGS Advisory, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides accounting, taxation, company secretarial, general corporate, and consultancy services in Hong Kong. The company operates in Accounting and Corporate Services, Corporate Restructuring and Insolvency, and Multi-Disciplinary Advisory segments. The Accounting and Corporate Services segment offers accounting, corporate, and tax advisory services. The Corporate Restructuring and Insolvency segment provides company winding-up services, including voluntary winding-up and compulsory winding-up services; and personal bankruptcy, restructuring, lender, creditors' rights, monitoring, receivership, and turnaround management services. The Multi-Disciplinary Advisory segment offers forensic and litigation advisory services, such as quantifying damages and providing independent expert opinion in various dispute situations relating to intellectual property, breach of contract, insurance claims, asset recovery, and fraud/criminal investigations; employing forensic accounting and complex modeling methods to provide insight on the facts and offer clarity on complex financial transactions; independently tracing, gathering, and analyzing critical information; and providing electronic evidence services that identify, preserve, and collect relevant structured information and analyze complex data. This segment also offers engineering and quantity surveying services. The company also owns residential property located in Tuen Mun, New Territories. It serves individuals, small and medium sized businesses, and charitable organizations. ADGS Advisory, Inc. is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

AIFM.summary: AIFarm, Ltd., a development stage company, develops a proprietary growing system that designs and builds custom biodomes worldwide. Its biodomes are used for commercial agricultural concerns, as well as small local producers. The company was formerly known as Eco Energy Tech Asia, Ltd. and changed its name to AIFarm, Ltd. in January 2020. AIFarm, Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

ARMC.summary: Asiarim Corporation designs, markets, and distributes multimedia and computer products primarily in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. Its product portfolio includes ultra mobile portable computers, netbooks, notebooks, computer accessories, pen touch computers and monitors, LED TV monitors, and media center systems. The company markets and distributes its products under the Commodore brand name through mass merchandisers, discount retailers, electronics retailers, distributors, and specialty catalogers. Asiarim Corporation was founded in 2007 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

BDG.F.long_name: Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited
BDG.F.summary: Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various services for infrastructure construction. The company operates through two segments, Design, Survey, and Consultancy; and Construction Contracting. The company offers design, surveying and mapping, monitoring, and consulting services for engineering of urban rail transit, industrial and civil construction, and municipal engineering projects; and construction contracting services related to urban rail transit and the service concession arrangements under the build-operate-transfer arrangements.
